A I J S

A

applyTransformations(CtClass) - Method in interface javassist.build.IClassTransformer
Concrete implementations must implement all transformations on this method.

I

IClassTransformer - Interface in javassist.build
A common interface to define class transformers, java (or groovy) entities that can manipulate classes during build processes, right after javac compiled them.

J

javassist.build - package javassist.build
 
JavassistBuildException - Exception in javassist.build
A generic build exception when applying a transformer.
JavassistBuildException() - Constructor for exception javassist.build.JavassistBuildException
 
JavassistBuildException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception javassist.build.JavassistBuildException
 
JavassistBuildException(String) - Constructor for exception javassist.build.JavassistBuildException
 
JavassistBuildException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception javassist.build.JavassistBuildException
 

S

shouldTransform(CtClass) - Method in interface javassist.build.IClassTransformer
Test if the given class is suitable for applying transformations or not.
